snippet: TALCAHUANO, Chile - Reporters who cover world-class calamity see a clear pattern. Nature's havoc is unpredictable and unpreventable. But death tolls that climb high into five and six figures are man-made.
abstract: TALCAHUANO, Chile - Reporters who cover world-class calamity see a clear pattern. Nature's havoc is unpredictable and unpreventable. But death tolls that climb high into five and six figures are man-made.
